arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund vs RB Leipzig – Predicted lineup and team news
arts.sum: Borussia Dortmund welcomes RB Leipzig to Signal Iduna Park on Saturday for a crucial Bundesliga encounter featuring two of the league’s most impressive teams currently occupying second and third positions. Dortmund are enjoying an undefeated streak this campaign and is riding high after a commanding 4-1 victory in the Champions League against Athletic Club. arts.ttl: Borussia Dortmund vs. RB Leipzig preview: The battle of two in-form sides awaits
arts.sum: A red-hot Borussia Dortmund host an RB Leipzig side starting to find their feet under Ole Werner this Saturday afternoon on Matchday 6.
